DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study test safety local tolerance repeat treatment AM-101 .
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label extension study assess safety local tolerance repeat treatment AM-101 subject previously treat scope TACTT3 study .
DOC.criteria: Completion TACTT3 study ; Negative pregnancy test ( woman childbearing potential ) ; Willing able attend study visit . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Adverse event lead treatment discontinuation TACTT3 ; Meniere 's Disease , endolymphatic hydrops , acoustic neuroma , severe fluctuate hearing loss , otitis medium , otitis externa , abnormality tympanic membrane ; Ongoing drugbased therapy otitis medium otitis externa ; Drugbased therapy know potentially tinnitusinducing ; Other treatment tinnitus ; Drug abuse alcoholism ; Subjects psychiatric disease require drug treatment ; Use antidepressant antianxiety medication ; Any clinically relevant disorder abnormality physical examination ; Women breastfeeding , pregnant planning become pregnant study ; Women childbearing potential unwilling unable practice contraception . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
